TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpRequestBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 用作一些类的基类，这些类使 ASP.NET 可以读取客户端在 Web 请求过程中发送的 HTTP 值。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that enable ASP.NET to read the HTTP values sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类，包含相同的成员类。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 类，可创建如下所示的派生的类类，但你可以自定义并使用 ASP.NET 管道外部。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 在执行单元测试时，通常使用派生的类以实现具有自定义可满足要测试的方案的行为的成员。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members that have customized behavior that fulfills the scenario that you are testing. 类是从 类派生的。The class derives from the class. 类用作的包装器类。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在运行时，您通常使用的实例类来调用的成员对象。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to invoke members of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化该类供继承的类实例使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abort() cil managed
abstract member Abort : unit -> unit override this.Abort : unit -> unit

summary.span: 强制地终止基础 TCP 连接，会导致任何显著的 I/O 失败。

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是线程安全的。This method is thread-safe. 任何线程可能在任何时候对其进行调用。Any thread may call it at any time.

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，获取应用程序根目录的虚拟路径，并通过对应用程序根目录使用波形符(~)表示法，将该路径转变为相对路径(如 "~/page.aspx" 的形式)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual path of the application root and makes it relative by using the tilde (~) notation for the application root (as in "~/page.aspx").

value.span: 当前请求的应用程序根目录的虚拟路径(添加了波形符运算符 (~))。

span.span: The virtual path of the application root for the current request with the tilde operator (~) added.
Always.

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，获取当前请求的虚拟路径。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual path of the current request.

value.span: 当前正在执行的页处理程序的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the page handler that is currently executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回当前正在执行的页处理程序的文件路径。The property returns the file path of the currently executing page handler. 当您重定向使用的请求方法或方法，属性 （子页） 到返回的页的重定向的路径。When you redirect a request using either the method or the method, the property returns the path of the page that you are redirecting to (the child page). 但是，客户端定向到另一个页面，属性返回原始页的路径。However, when the client is redirected to another page, the property returns the path to the original page.

span.span: Always.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed
abstract member ValidateInput : unit -> unit override this.ValidateInput : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，引发对通过 、 和 属性访问的集合的验证。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用输入的验证标志以确定是否执行验证，通过访问的请求集合， ，和属性。The class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the , , and properties. 方法设置这些标志这样，当`get`访问器， ，或调用属性，将执行输入的验证。The method sets these flags so that when the `get` accessors of the , , or properties are invoked, input validation is performed. 验证工作原理是检查所有输入的数据与潜在的危险数据的硬编码列表。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.

span.span: Always.
